DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety 4 mg zoledronic acid administer intravenously every 3-4 week treatment bone metastases-related pain patient prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Zoledronic Acid Treatment Bone Metastases-related Pain Patients With Prostate Cancer
